The plane defined by (x-a)*n =0 is:
a = (500, 300, 200)
n = (1, 2, 3)
The eye e is:
e = (1000, 900.23, 100.116)

Vertices I used to create the 2d coordinate system and their projections are:
v1 = (-50, 50, 50)
v2 = (-50, -50, 50)
v3 = (50, 50, 50)

pv1 = (492.952, 489.652, 75.9148)
pv2 = (525.656, 470.958, 77.4758)
pv3 = (524.863, 474.992, 75.0508)

The 2 vectors a and b that are in the plane are:
a = pv1-pv2 = (-32.7042, 18.6935, -1.56095)
b = pv3-pv1 = (31.9108, -14.6593, -0.864082)

The w1 and w2 obtained from a and b (these now are perpendicular and of magnitude 1) are:
w1 = (-0.867437, 0.495822, -0.0414022)
w2 = (0.419673, 0.684433, -0.596176)

The center of the cube in first frame and its projection are:
center = (0, 0, 0)
p0 = (548.244, 493.546, 54.888)

The coordinates in the 2d plane x = p0 + u*w1 + v*w2 are:
(where p0 is the origin, preferraby the projection of the center of the cube in first frame, w1 and w2 are 2 perpendicular vertices in the plane)
p0 = (548.244, 493.546, 54.888)
w1 = (-0.867437, 0.495822, -0.0414022)
w2 = (0.419673, 0.684433, -0.596176)

The frame1 in 3d has the following edges:
(-50, 50, 50), (-50, -50, 50)
(-50, 50, 50), (50, 50, 50)
(-50, 50, 50), (-50, 50, -50)
(50, -50, -50), (50, 50, -50)
(50, -50, -50), (-50, -50, -50)
(50, -50, -50), (50, -50, 50)
(-50, -50, 50), (-50, -50, -50)
(-50, -50, 50), (50, -50, 50)
(50, 50, -50), (50, 50, 50)
(50, 50, -50), (-50, 50, -50)
(-50, -50, -50), (-50, 50, -50)
(50, 50, 50), (50, -50, 50)
The frame1 in 2d has the following edges:
(45.1609, -38.4056), (7.45877, -38.4056)
(45.1609, -38.4056), (10.2477, -34.5316)
(45.1609, -38.4056), (24.7353, 32.6161)
